title: Endings Guide
content:

There is a total of 17,000+ endings. The story is affected by the character's nature, actions, and choices. Some endings have a corresponding Trophy that will be unlocked upon achieving that particular ending. Endings have multiple variations that cover the companions, character identity, decisions, and such.

Baldur's Gate 3 Main Story Endings

Destroy the Netherbrain and the Tadpoles under its command
